clinical_indications: Knee pain with mechanical symptoms (ICD-10: M25.56x)
prerequisites: Member must have a documented diagnosis consistent with one of the above conditions.
Weight-bearing X-rays of the affected knee must be completed within the past 60 days prior to MRI request.
documentation_requirements: Recent clinical notes (within 30 days) documenting: History and physical examination
Specific clinical findings (exam maneuvers, ROM, effusion)
Conservative treatment records: Physical therapy notes with dates and number of sessions
